title: Paper Chase:  Radiocarbon Dating of Scrolls and Linen Fragments from the Judean Desert
post: No comparison can be made, the objects are different, and the preservation even more different.
author: Louis

title: Paper Chase:  Radiocarbon Dating of Scrolls and Linen Fragments from the Judean Desert
post: To my mind, the paper demonstrates that it is possible to obtain reliable C14 dates around 1st century Judea for parchment, papyrus and linen samples, as corroborated by paleographic evidence at the 1 & 2 sigma levels.
author: daveb of wellington nz

title: Paper Chase:  Radiocarbon Dating of Scrolls and Linen Fragments from the Judean Desert
post: But that does not mean any comparison can be made with Shroud dating.
author: Louis
